summary: The diff implements a comprehensive EVRON website redesign with most requirements satisfied. The implementation includes new Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy pages, updated product specifications with detailed features and warranty information, reordered sections (Products before About), contact form with phone field, footer with navigation links, and premium corporate styling with green (#2ecc71) branding. The backend was updated to support the phone field with migration logic. However, several requirements related to image generation and specific visual elements cannot be verified from code alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Redesign the EVRON logo with two symmetrical green leaves forming a subtle 'V' shape with EVRON text below in bold modern sans-serif
missing_requirements.reason: The code references evron-logo.dim_400x400.png but does not show the actual logo design or generation. Cannot verify if the logo meets the V-shape leaf design specification from code alone.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create an energetic and powerful hero section background with a subtle energy pattern or gradient
missing_requirements.reason: Code references hero-energy-bg.dim_1920x1080.png but does not show the actual background image generation or confirm it contains an energy pattern/gradient as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Regenerate all product images with realistic commercial product photography style featuring EVRON logo, tagline, and branding printed on casing
missing_requirements.reason: Code references product image files (ev-battery-product.dim_800x800.png, solar-battery-product.dim_800x800.png, etc.) but does not show actual image generation or confirm they meet the realistic commercial photography specifications with printed branding.

missing_requirements.requirement: GST Registered badge style element should be visible throughout the website
missing_requirements.reason: While a GST badge image (gst-badge.dim_200x200.png) is referenced and displayed in the About section, the requirement states it should be a 'badge style element' visible throughout the website, but it only appears in one location.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module for data migration from old inquiry structure to new structure with phone field
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention creating a migration module. While this supports the phone field addition (REQ-47), the migration module itself was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media icons in Footer component (Facebook, X/Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states in non-goals: 'Integrating social media APIs' and does not request social media icons in the footer specification (REQ-50).

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention adding a 'Built with ❤️ by Caffeine.ai' attribution or UTM tracking links in the footer.
